Past Events

2024

December: Git and GitHub Workshop Hands-on session covering version control basics, collaborative workflows, and open source contribution.

November: Tech Talk Series - Cloud Computing Industry professional discussed cloud architecture, DevOps practices, and career paths in cloud engineering.

October: Fall Hackathon 2024 48-hour hackathon with 80+ participants building innovative projects across web, mobile, and hardware categories.

September: Python for Beginners Introductory workshop for first-year students covering Python fundamentals and practical programming exercises.

August: Welcome Week Tech Fair Showcased club projects, recruited new members, and demonstrated various technical domains students can explore.

Want to Present or Sponsor?

If you’re interested in giving a tech talk, conducting a workshop, or sponsoring our events, please contact us. We’re always looking for opportunities to bring valuable experiences to our members.
